meta.description: A map based tool to create a postcard showing the landuse distribution in your neighborhood

description:
Here you can create a postcard showing the distribution of land use in your neighbourhood of the Canton of Basel-Stadt. Simply move the map or search for a location. You can also change the text on the postcard.

Maps are always (partial) perspectives on reality. Here, too, we have summarised the data in advance. The map also only shows how land is used, but not by whom it can be used. It is therefore possible, for example, that some green or sports areas shown are not accessible to the public.

footer.background: Quartierfarben was initially developed for Berlin under the name 'Kiezcolors' by ODIS and CityLAB Berlin. The Research Unit Cartography at TU Wien adapted it for Vienna with 'Grätzlfarben'. The DCC Data Competence Center of the Statistical Office of the Canton Basel-Stadt reused the project for its own Canton. The code for this project can by found on GitHub.
